modName: Easy Armors Weapons and Shouts Cheats
summary:
This is a easy way to cheat Weapons and Armors with the Console Command \" bat x \"
Real M@SAru
descriptionHtml:
Download it Manual , not Manager =)
This is a easy way to cheat Weapons and Armors with the Console Command \" bat x \"

Armors Weapons
1 = Daedric Armors & Weapons
2 = Hide Armors
3 = Iron Armors & Weapons
4 = Imperial Armors & Weapons
5 = Steel Armors & Weapons
6 = Leather Armors  
7 = Dwarven Armors & Weapons
8 = Elven Armors & Weapons
9 = Orcish Armors Â´& Weapons 
10 = Ebony Armors & Weapons 
11 = Glass Armors & Weapons
12 = Dragon Armors 


Shouts
13 = Unrelenting Force
14 = Ice Form
15 = Strom Call
16 = Fire Breath
17 = Slow Time
18 = Whirlwind Sprint
19 = Animal Allegiance
20 = Elemental Fury
21 = Become Ethereal
22 = Throw Voice
23 = Disam
24 = Clear Skies
25 = Call of Valor
26 = Dragonrend
27 = Marked for Death
28 = Aura Whisper
29 = Call Dragon
30 = Kyne\'s Peace
31 = Dismaying Shout
32 = Frost Breath


To make this .bat file work, it needs to be in the same folder as the main TESV.exe file, so it goes here; 

\"C:Program Files (x86)Steamsteamappscommonskyrim\" 

Then, while in-game, hit your Tilde key (just above TAB and below ESC - at the top left of your keyboard - it looks like this: ` 

Now type; 

bat x 

Now hit ENTER 

NOTE: The value of \'X\' is only used here to demonstrate a choice YOU make in game. 

As an example, for Daedric armor & weapons you would type; 

bat 1 

--- 
Do NOT type with quotemarks, eg; 

\"bat x\" 
-------- 
Do NOT type; 

bat x.txt 
--------- 
ONLY TYPE; 

bat x 

then hit ENTER. 

A big thanks to Valorien
author: Real MASaru
